definitions.definition: A long, broad and thick piece of timber , as opposed to a board which is less thick.
A political issue that is of concern to a faction or a party of the people and the political position that is taken on that issue.
examples: Germanization was a central plank of German conservative thinking in the 19th and 20th centuries.

definitions.definition: Physical exercise in which one holds a pushup position for a measured length of time.

main_definition: A long, broad and thick piece of timber , as opposed to a board which is less thick.
secondary_definitions: ( figurative ) A political issue that is of concern to a faction or a party of the people and the political position that is taken on that issue.
Physical exercise in which one holds a pushup position for a measured length of time.
( British , slang ) A stupid person, idiot .
